body:
Hi Bao, Now you can download the public release of Ladybug 0.0.62 and Honeybee 0.0.59!!
[http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug) Follow Mostapha's instructions about how install new version of LB HB. About your new issue, I think the problem is your model tolerance, go to Rhino Options/Units to see it. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/A5A8jJ8*wsCsngYdvmjFnBdGwvxmiu5PuhrEyR8wPedkbOYuy8jQnle*SQOn5d8DLjZf7ajGhPTbYupBSNHOFqft7SIRsCwg/02.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/A5A8jJ8*wsB1B--YdSLsdMW-0weOERODJ*FdAu5rnatF-2eawkSZzA0Pi4-mZcaXlpnjE9PSxSwD7egumg4sWQfyJYM4wFZd/03.png) You can read this discussion for other details: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/outdoor-com...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/outdoor-comfort-solar-adjusted-mrt-issue-with-contect) Read the reply written by Chris. For your future models, I suggest you use "meters" directly, it's easier Bests Antonello
